hints.content:
We need the difference between $\red{\text{Edith's}}$ cookies and $\blue{\text{Drew's}}$ cookies, so we will subtract.

$\red{8} - \blue{6} = \green{\Box}$

Or we can see how many more cookies $\blue{\text{Drew}}$ needs to equal $\red{\text{Edith's}}$ cookies.

$\blue{6} + \green{\Box} = \red{8}$
Edith ate $\green{2}$ more cookies than Drew.

question.content:
Drew ate $6$ cookies.

Edith ate $8$ cookies.

**Edith ate [[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] more cookies than Drew.**
